name: The Bouncer (itch)
description:
Welcome to your new hustle,

In your booth you will review and make sure the people at the door are authorized to enter our "Legit" company. inspired by papers please.

Programming: Dave Ruptash

Art: Miroslav Harant

Controls:

- Mouse to click and drag documents.

- Space to Zoom in the document

- Press the Green/Red buttons to allow/Deny access.

- Survive for 5 days.
